results.title: microsoft/node-pty: Fork pseudoterminals in Node.JS - GitHub
results.snippet: This allows you to fork processes with pseudoterminal file descriptors. It returns a terminal object which allows reads and writes.
results.htmlSnippet: This allows you to fork processes with pseudoterminal file descriptors. It returns a terminal object which allows reads and writes.
